Hockey

End of season in the Ice Hockey League: ACSH Gheorgheni won its first championship

ACSH Gheorgheni won its first national ice hockey championship title on Sunday evening, after defeating Corona Brașov 2-1 (1-1, 0-0, 1-0) in the final played at the new Sepsi Arena in Sfântu Gheorghe. Roberto Gliga opened the score for Corona…
